dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 373 admission CT scans of adult patients with bleeding pelvic fractures and varying degrees of instability, annotated using the Tile AO/OTA grading system by three trauma-subspecialized radiologists.
dcterms:title: CT scans of adult patients with pelvic fractures
